description: The Windows SDK provides tools, compilers, headers, libraries, code samples, and a new help system that developers can use to create applications that run on Microsoft Windows. You can use the Windows SDK to write applications using the native (Win32/COM) or managed (.NET Framework) programming model.
displayName: Microsoft Windows SDK for Windows 7 and .NET Framework 4
summary: Microsoft Windows Software Development Kit (SDK) for Windows 7 and .NET Framework 4
author: Microsoft Corporation
